readable.title: 2522297487_57edf117f7
readable.content: A lady holds a little boy while another little boy smiles at them . An older lady holds a toddler while another boy watches . a white woman in a green sweater holds a smiling child whilst a smiling boy in a yellow shirt looks on . A woman holds a baby while a boy sits next to her smiling . A woman holds a baby while another child looks on .
